description.en:
⚔️ First recorded major battle in history
🏺 Fought between Egypt (Ramses II) and the Hittites (Muwatalli II)
🤝 Ended in the world’s first known peace treaty
description.la:
⚔️ Prima pugna magna notata in historia
🏺 Inter Aegyptios (Ramses II) et Hethaeos (Muwatalli II)
🤝 Finita foedere pacis primo in orbe terrarum

description.en:
🏛️ Greek city-states vs Persian Empire
⚔️ Famous battles: Marathon, Thermopylae, Salamis
🔥 Greek victory preserved Western civilization’s independence
description.la:
🏛️ Civitates Graecae contra Imperium Persarum
⚔️ Pugnae clarae: Marathon, Thermopylae, Salamis
🔥 Victoria Graecorum libertatem servavit

description.en:
⚔️ Athens vs Sparta — democracy vs militarism
🏛️ Chronicled by Thucydides
💀 Weakened Greece, paving way for Macedonian conquest
description.la:
⚔️ Athenarum civitas contra Spartam — democratia contra disciplinam militarem
🏛️ A Thucydide narratum
💀 Graeciam debilitavit, viam aperuit Macedonibus

description.en:
🚢 Rome vs Carthage — struggle for Mediterranean dominance
🐘 Hannibal crossed the Alps with elephants
🔥 Carthage destroyed, Rome became supreme power
description.la:
🚢 Roma contra Carthaginem — de imperio Mediterranei certatum
🐘 Hannibal Alpes cum elephantis transiit
🔥 Carthago deleta, Roma dominatrix facta est

description.en:
⚔️ Julius Caesar’s campaigns in Gaul
🇫🇷 Conquest of modern France and Belgium
📜 Expanded Roman territory and Caesar’s fame
description.la:
⚔️ Expeditiones Caesaris in Gallia
🇫🇷 Galliam atque Belgicam subegit
📜 Terras auxit et gloriam suam ampliavit

description.en:
✝️ Religious wars between Christians and Muslims
🏰 Aimed to reclaim the Holy Land
⚔️ Left deep cultural and political impact on Europe and the Middle East
description.la:
✝️ Bella religiosa inter Christianos et Mahometanos
🏰 Pro Terra Sancta recuperanda
⚔️ Cultura et politica Europae atque Orientis commutata sunt

description.en:
⚔️ France vs England — dynastic struggle for French throne
👑 Key figures: Joan of Arc, Edward III
🇫🇷 Ended with French victory and rise of nationalism
description.fr:
⚔️ France contre Angleterre — querelle dynastique pour le trône
👑 Jeanne d’Arc, Édouard III
🇫🇷 Victoire française et naissance du sentiment national

description.en:
🔥 One of Europe’s deadliest wars
✝️ Protestant vs Catholic — power struggle in the Holy Roman Empire
📜 Ended with Peace of Westphalia (1648)
description.la:
🔥 Bellum Europae cruentissimum
✝️ Protestantes contra Catholicos in Sacro Imperio Romano
📜 Pacem Westphalicam finem fecit (1648)

description.en:
🌍 First 'world war' involving Europe, America, and Asia
⚔️ Britain vs France for global supremacy
🇬🇧 British victory laid foundation for empire
description.fr:
🌍 Première 'guerre mondiale' reliant Europe, Amérique et Asie
⚔️ Royaume-Uni contre France pour la suprématie mondiale
🇬🇧 Victoire britannique et naissance de l'Empire

description.en:
🇺🇸 13 colonies rebelled against British rule
📜 Declaration of Independence (1776)
🤝 French alliance led to American victory
description.fr:
🇺🇸 13 colonies se révoltent contre la domination britannique
📜 Déclaration d’indépendance (1776)
🤝 Alliance française aboutit à la victoire américaine

description.en:
⚔️ France under Napoleon vs Europe’s coalitions
🏰 Battles: Austerlitz, Leipzig, Waterloo
🌍 Redefined European borders and nationalism
description.fr:
⚔️ La France napoléonienne contre les coalitions européennes
🏰 Batailles: Austerlitz, Leipzig, Waterloo
🌍 Redéfinition des frontières et du nationalisme européen

description.en:
⚔️ Union (North) vs Confederacy (South)
💣 Bloodiest conflict in U.S. history
🕊️ Ended slavery and preserved the Union
description.fr:
⚔️ Union (Nord) contre Confédération (Sud)
💣 Guerre la plus meurtrière des États-Unis
🕊️ Abolition de l’esclavage et préservation de l’Union

description.en:
🌍 'The Great War' — first industrial global conflict
⚔️ Central Powers vs Allies
💀 16 million dead; ended with Treaty of Versailles (1919)
description.fr:
🌍 'La Grande Guerre' — premier conflit mondial industriel
⚔️ Empires centraux contre Alliés
💀 16 millions de morts; Traité de Versailles (1919)

description.en:
🔥 Largest conflict in human history
⚔️ Allies vs Axis (Hitler, Mussolini, Japan)
☢️ Ended with atomic bombings and UN creation
description.fr:
🔥 Plus grand conflit de l’histoire humaine
⚔️ Alliés contre Axe (Hitler, Mussolini, Japon)
☢️ Fin avec les bombes atomiques et la création de l’ONU

description.en:
🛰️ Ideological standoff between USA and USSR
🚀 Nuclear arms race and space race
🌍 Proxy wars in Korea, Vietnam, Afghanistan
description.fr:
🛰️ Confrontation idéologique entre États-Unis et URSS
🚀 Course aux armements nucléaires et à l’espace
🌍 Guerres indirectes en Corée, Vietnam, Afghanistan

description.en:
⚔️ North Korea (China, USSR) vs South Korea (UN, USA)
🧊 First major Cold War conflict
🕊️ Armistice left peninsula divided at 38th parallel
description.ko:
⚔️ 북한(중국, 소련) 대 남한(UN, 미국)
🧊 냉전의 첫 주요 전쟁
🕊️ 정전 후 한반도는 38선에서 분단됨

description.en:
🌴 Guerrilla war between communist North and U.S.-backed South
💣 Heavy U.S. involvement, mass protests
🕊️ Ended with communist victory and unification
description.vi:
🌴 Chiến tranh du kích giữa miền Bắc cộng sản và miền Nam được Mỹ hậu thuẫn
💣 Sự can thiệp lớn của Hoa Kỳ, các cuộc biểu tình quy mô lớn
🕊️ Kết thúc bằng chiến thắng và thống nhất của miền Bắc

description.en:
🛢️ Iraq invaded Kuwait — U.S.-led coalition intervened
💥 Precision air campaign ('Operation Desert Storm')
🌍 First televised modern war
description.ar:
🛢️ غزت العراق الكويت — تدخل تحالف بقيادة الولايات المتحدة
💥 حملة جوية دقيقة (عاصفة الصحراء)
🌍 أول حرب حديثة متلفزة

description.en:
🕋 Began after September 11 attacks (2001)
⚔️ U.S. invasions of Afghanistan and Iraq
🌍 Ongoing global fight against terrorism
description.ar:
🕋 بدأت بعد هجمات 11 سبتمبر (2001)
⚔️ غزو الولايات المتحدة لأفغانستان والعراق
🌍 استمرار الحرب العالمية ضد الإرهاب

description.en:
⚔️ Russia invaded Ukraine in 2022
💣 Massive destruction and displacement
🌍 Sparked global geopolitical realignment
description.uk:
⚔️ Росія вторглася в Україну у 2022 році
💣 Масові руйнування та біженці
🌍 Спричинила глобальні геополітичні зрушення
